name: Ethereal Eyes Eyeshadow Palette: Moonlight
about: What it is: An iconic, moonlight-inspired palette with 12 universal, neutral shades in four finishes to create your most versatile, ethereal looks yet...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, and triclosan. These products are also cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: Experience Mario’s artistic vision come to life with this limited-edition palette. Inside, you’ll find 12 buildable, blendable shades in four unique finishes to create versatile looks that last. It is also ophthalmologist tested and approved. The glossy shimmer finish is a first-of-its-kind, pearl-infused formula that adorns eyelids with a reflective, wet-looking shine. The new sueded satin finish has a smooth suede texture with a demi, silky sheen for subtle luminosity. The sueded matte finish delivers enhanced grip for rich color, while the natural metallic finish amplifies shine with micronized pigments...This Palette Contains:.- 12 x 0.04 oz/ 1 g Eyeshadows in 1 (satin cream), 2 (shimmering opal), 3 (matte mauve brown), 4 (metallic slate), 5 (matte gray beige), 6 (shimmering bronzy gold), 7 (shimmering taupe), 8 (satin cool gray), 9 (matte warm brown), 10 (shimmering golden gunmetal), 11 (matte midnight blue), 12 (matte black)
ingredients: Shade 1: .Mica, Zinc Stearate, Talc, Silica, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Boron Nitride, Cellulose, Nylon-12, Polyethylene, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Diisostearyl Malate, Phenoxyethanol, Sorbic Acid, Triethoxycaprylylsilane. [+/-: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Ultramarines (CI 77007), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Manganese Violet (CI 77742)]....Shade 2: .Dimethicone, Mica, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Silica, HDI/Trimethylol Hexyllactone Crosspolymer, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Magnesium Myristate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Tin Oxide, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Water/Aqua, Behenyl Methacrylate/t-Butyl Methacrylate Copolymer, Isododecane. how_to_use: Suggested Usage:..-Use any combination of shades to create an ethereal look, day or night..-The shadows can be worn alone or layered for maximum payoff..-Use your favorite MAKEUP BY MARIO eyeshadow brush (sold separately) for a flawless application....Pro tips:.-Use your fingers to tap the glossy shimmer shadows onto lids, or use the EF1 Brush (sold separately)..-Need inspiration? Head to MAKEUP BY MARIO’s Instagram for the latest looks.
